Lyric:
[by:超级玛丽跳呀]
[00:01.66]Every breath you take
[00:04.29]I watch you slip away
[00:07.15]You're slowly killing yourself
[00:14.53]Every breath you take
[00:17.28]I watch you slip away
[00:20.51]You're slowly killing yourself
[00:24.00]I won't give in
[00:28.00]Shan Xiaohan 
[00:39.47]If my heart could sing, would you stay?
[00:45.41]Would you stay and listen?
[00:48.59]Would you stay and listen?

[00:52.40]If my soul was torn, would you help?
[00:58.65]Would you try and fix me?
[01:01.49]Would you help un-break me?

[01:05.22]Your smile, it eats me alive
[01:08.36]And I can't turn away any longer

[01:12.00]Every breath you take
[01:14.95]I watch you slip away
[01:18.12]You're slowly killing yourself
[01:21.55]I won't give in

[01:24.93]Every breath you take
[01:27.59]I watch you slip away
[01:30.84]You're slowly killing yourself
[01:34.51]I won't give in

[01:37.00]I'm a ghost of what's left of me
[01:42.80]Begging you to hear me
[01:46.44]Can you even feel me?

[01:49.91]I can't let you go, save me please
[01:56.19]Will you stay here with me?
[01:59.23]Will you ever leave me?

[02:02.91]Your smile it eats me alive
[02:06.90]And I can't turn away any longer

[02:09.66]Every breath you take
[02:12.50]I watch you slip away
[02:15.58]You're slowly killing yourself
[02:19.16]I won't give in

[02:22.50]Every breath you take
[02:25.27]I watch you slip away
[02:28.52]You're slowly killing yourself
[02:31.30]I won't give in

[02:37.58]I gave you everything
[02:40.83]I never thought we would end up like this
[02:44.25]I gave you everything
[02:47.14]I can't let you go, save me please

[02:50.50]I gave you everything
[02:54.64](I won't give in)
[02:58.27]I gave you everything
[03:01.22](I won't give in)
[03:04.00]Every breath you take
[03:06.92]I watch you slip away
[03:10.11]You're slowly killing yourself

[03:13.97](I'll be your light in the darkness)
[03:16.85]Every breath you take
[03:19.80]I watch you slip away
[03:22.75]You're slowly killing yourself
[03:26.55]I won't give in

[03:29.66]Every breath you take
[03:32.38]I watch you slip away
[03:35.77]You're slowly killing yourself
[03:39.42]I won't give in

[03:42.00]I gave you everything
[03:44.82]I never thought we would end up like this
